welcome_message_body: Welcome to Valinhos, Brazil! Known for its beautiful vineyards, charming countryside, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful and memorable stay with us.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viracopos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
